## Usage

| Property   | Attribute  | Description | Type      | Default   |
| ---------- | ---------- | ----------- | --------- | --------- |

| `desktop`  | `desktop`  |             | `boolean` | `false`   |
| `display`  | `display`  |             | `string`  | `'flex'`  |
